record.field: ${object.company_id.name} invites you to participate in a consent process

div.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: #333333; max-width: 600px; margin: auto; border: 1px solid #DDDDDD; border-radius: 8px; overflow: hidden;
background-color: #F8F8F8; padding: 20px; text-align: center; font-size: 18px; border-bottom: 1px solid #DDDDDD;

div.p: The other guardian or your spouse in your family has joined the ${object.company_id.name} as a member. This membership is family-based, allowing parents of special needs children living in the same household to join. According to the association's rules, each person joining must personally submit their information to the membership register.
With the joining of your spouse or the other guardian, the family-based membership fee has already been covered, ensuring no additional charge for your membership.

a.style: display: inline-block; padding: 12px 24px; background-color: #875A7B; color: #FFFFFF; border-radius: 5px; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold;

div.p: If you have any questions about your membership or the activities of ${object.company_id.name}, feel free to contact ${object.company_id.email}.
